name: Rebalancer Stable Joint Provider
description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a join liquidity provider for a Stable Pool on [Balancer](https://app.balancer.fi). Rewards are harvested, split between the pairs, sold for more {{token}}, and deposited back into the strategy.
